sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' import Card from "../../components/card" import FormGroup from '../../components/form-group' import SelectMenu from '../../components/selectMenu' import EntryList from './entryList' import EntryService from '../../app/services/entryService' import LocalStorageService from '../../app/services/localStorageService' class Entries extends React.Component { state = { year: '', month: '', type: '', status: '', entries: [] } constructor() { super() this.service = new EntryService() } search = () => { const currentUser = LocalStorageService.getItem('_usuario_logado') this.service.filter({ id: currentUser.id, year: this.state.year, month: this.state.month, type: this.state.type, status: this.status.status }).then(response => { this.setState({ entries: response.data }) }) } render() { const months = [ { label: 'Choose...', value: '' }, { label: 'January', value: 1 }, { label: 'February', value: 2 }, { label: 'March', value: 3 }, { label: 'April', value: 4 }, { label: 'May', value: 5 }, { label: 'June', value: 6 }, { label: 'July', value: 7 }, { label: 'August', value: 8 }, { label: 'September', value: 9 }, { label: 'October', value: 10 }, { label: 'November', value: 11 }, { label: 'December', value: 12 } ] const types = [ { label: 'Choose...', value: '' }, { label: 'Despesa', value: 'DESPESA' }, { label: 'Receita', value: 'RECEITA' } ] return (
this.setState({ year: e.target.value })} id="inputYear" placeholder="Year" /> this.setState({ month: e.target.value })} className="form-control" options={months} /> this.setState({ type: e.target.value })} className="form-control" options={types} />

) } } export default withRouter(Entries)
